name: Go Back (Honesty, Un_wise)
description:
Controls:
- Movement via WASD
- Time Duplicate - Space (brings you back to the orange indicator)
- Restart Level - R
- You can mute the music using M.

Gameplay time: 10-15 Minutes Average

Equipped with an unstable time travelling device, your task is to escape the secret laboratory. Everytime you rewind the time, a copy of yourself stays behind and holds down buttons for a short duration. If you get caught in a closing door, you still have a turn to move outside or inside. Blue buttons are on toggle mode, red buttons are on hold mode.

Game created by Bogdan Apetrei and Stelian Stoian for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Music provided by Royalty Free Zone:
https://www.youtube.com/royaltyfreezone
